driver_statement: I got hit from behind on the left rear. Andy was still fully behind me.Causing me to crash into the barrier and with a lot of damage and losing the race in last position.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Additional 5 championship point penalty for Andy

driver_statement: Car #12 does not slow for the evolving incident ahead, they power past a spinning car, abruptly changes direction to avoid and cause contact with car #5 which results in visible damage to car #5. This seems to be in contradiction to rule 17.2 which states that "You should be reducing speed and be prepared to stop if necessary".
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Failure to comply with Rule 17.2 - Alejandro Ulate

driver_statement: Simon does not slow down for the yellow flag and ends up rear ends me and damages my car.
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Stewards find Simon was slowing sufficiently however had contact caused from behind by Danny Switzer that pushes Simon into Samy. Penalty for Danny.

driver_statement: Simon Hunt rear ends me again and adds to the damage he has done 2 laps ago
stewards_decision: NFA - No further Action
stewards_comments: Push to pass Simon Hunt, although the Ariba car allowed the redress after the corner, so Stewards didn't need to apply a position penalty

driver_statement: As I was allowing room on my inside between turn 6 and 7 car 88 rolled back on to circuit causing me to hit him causing race ending damage.
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Unsafe rejoin from Martin, stewards note the lack of brake effort not being applied until after the rejoin, this we take very seriously as not acceptable.

driver_statement: As per rule 14.1 and 14.2 after entering the formation zone car #014 fails to adhere to, or maintain the posted speed limit of 60mph/96kph, they slow to 47kph and never exceed a vmax of 89kph. They fluctuate between 80kph and 70kph even dropping to as low as 50kph on the final corner.
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Penalty for Mat Gatter & Gabriel Yimaz, Both did not follow the starting procedure properly. The Different classes are asked to stay stationary until a gap of around 2/2.5 second to the class ahead. then accelerate and stay at a constant speed until green flag is called.

driver_statement: Penalty for Mat Gatter & Gabriel Yimaz, Both did not follow the starting procedure properly. The Different classes are asked to stay stationary until a gap of around 2/2.5 second to the class ahead. then accelerate and stay at a constant speed until green flag is called.
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Penalty for Mat Gatter & Gabriel Yimaz, Both did not follow the starting procedure properly. The Different classes are asked to stay stationary until a gap of around 2/2.5 second to the class ahead. then accelerate and stay at a constant speed until green flag is called.

driver_statement: We haven't even crossed the starting line and Danny Switzer swerves into me, which inturn damages my steering. i have to pit to have repairs done to the car
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Stewards find that this incident was 50/50 between these 2 drivers, Elwyn and Danny. Elwyn fails to accelerate in a reasonable manner at the start of the race and Danny fails to be aware of his surroundings. This ultimately leads to the contact causing damage to Berry.

driver_statement: Gabriel Yilmaz does not follow race start procedure.
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Penalty for Mat Gatter & Gabriel Yimaz, Both did not follow the starting procedure properly. The Different classes are asked to stay stationary until a gap of around 2/2.5 second to the class ahead. then accelerate and stay at a constant speed until green flag is called.

driver_statement: Coming into the chute Shaun tries to make a move but understeers away from the apex and into me, spinning me around. Looking at the replay he may have been unsettled from contact with Harry
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Harry moves into Shaun on the way to braking zone and causes him to approach the apex at speed and unable to stop.

driver_statement: Car #117 hits the rear of car #05 on exit of T5 resulting in car #05 being span and a loss of positions.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: causing avoidable contact by understeering into Andy, please be patient and give racing room when in a side by side race.

driver_statement: Lap car refusing to yield, causes incident whilst driving too aggressively with leaders
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: Shaun fails to have any acknowledgement to the cars a lap ahead and back off, this causes collision and ends 4x cars races.

driver_statement: heading into turn 2 i was beside him exiting the corner and he turned into me and slowly pushed him the left of the track and we banged wheels, side by side heading into turn 4 i broke early as im on the inside of the track and he brake a little bit later he turned across my nose and i could do anything
stewards_decision: NFA - No further Action
stewards_comments: Both cars leading up to turn 4 make questionable decisions with a push to gain an advantage bringing Cory alongside Shaun. Heading into turn 4 Shaun moves right quite a lot however Cory could have given more racing room. overall there is no distinct violation that clearly makes either party predominantly to blame.

driver_statement: I had the inside of the corner and tried to leave room but felt Andy could have stayed a bit more right but we made contact turning me and resulted in me loosing multiple positions
stewards_decision: NFA - No further Action
stewards_comments:
The contact with t1 inside curb moves Mark's car half a car length towards Andy. This causes contact and unsettles Andy’s car making the collision that spins Mark. 

We cannot portion blame on either driver.

driver_statement: Gabriel Papaconstantinou shunted my car under braking which caused me to have too much speed going through turns 14 and 15 resulting in wheel damage from hitting the wall of champions.
stewards_decision: NFA - No further Action
stewards_comments:
Via the external side by side Gabriel had drawn alongside into the braking zone (just before the bride) Michael moves left and brakes in front of Gabriel contributing/ making the front to rear contact. 

We also see the brakes release from Michael where trail braking will have avoided the collision with the wall.

driver_statement:
In the braking zone for champions chicane and Gabriel missed his braking point went into my rear right and pushing me into the wall on the left and into the pits not only causing me damage but also forcing a pitstop slowing down my race which out me down to 43rd I believe from 37th

He obviously reached out and apologised but I still said it would be reported
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: Gabriel misses the braking zone and causes front to rear contact with Berry with severe damage.

driver_statement:
Bronze Formation Start - Not keeping to the required speed limit in the formation zone and accelerating well over, confusing the field

Drivers went on when the Race Director says "Br" for Bronze and not waiting until "Green Flag" so therefore jumped the start
stewards_decision: NFA - No further Action
stewards_comments:
The starting speed is 60mph or 96kph (we allow a 5mph buffer) this is a limit of 65mph or 105kph, Anyone exceeding this prior to the message appearing from race director will be penalised as stated above. 
If someone around or near you speed we advise you maintain your speed and you will not be penalised.

driver_statement: heading out of 14 and 15 i was behind a back marker also not obeying the blue flags and wasn't letting me go I pulled all the way to the left and he did the same, going side by side into turn 1 gave him the room but hit my left rear and made a unsafe release
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Corey has track position and has the inside line to turn 1, Andy has the right to be alongside but not hamper the faster car, due to the lack of awareness and racing room from Corey collision is made causing severe damage to Andy.

driver_statement: unsafe release which nearly took me and the jake who was the leaders
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Unsafe rejoin, reversing into a live track.

driver_statement: Me & Mark Baker had our races ruined by someone who decided to rejoin in the worst way possible.
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Unsafe rejoin causing severe damage to two cars.

driver_statement: Dangerous Rejoin.
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Unsafe rejoin causing contact.

driver_statement: Lap 1 close pack sends it causing damage and lack of straight line speed. Had opportunity if accident to allow cars through but didn't.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Penalty to Matt Cheverton

driver_statement: As the field slowed for the hairpin I braked to react to the cars in front and Simon Hunt clearly missed his braking point hitting me and causing damage to my car.The damage affected my race and the car out of corners.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Penalty for Simon Hunt

driver_statement: coming up to T12 everyone is bunching up so I brake a little earlier to avoid contact with the car in front but Jason behind comes in hot and makes contact with me giving me a meatball and I had to pit
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Penalty to Jason Raaff

driver_statement: Coming round T3 I saw the beema out of control and then Simon was stopped on the exit of the corner right on the racing line! Contact was made giving me 12 mins of repairs. Simon did say iRacing crashed
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Simon was stopped off the track not on the racing line as per the report. Mark should have shown caution where a car was slow/stopped. Stewards reviewed and believe Simon could have done more to remove his car from the placement he left it in, it appears placed rather than software issues.

driver_statement: I had a better run out of turn 3 and was along side him and in the braking zone of t4 he moved left which you could see on his onboard it was done intentional. This ruined my race completely as he broke all my steering.
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: Stewards find that Shaun moved in the braking zone to crowd Martin into T4 causing the contact.

driver_statement: Martin broke rules of messaging me mid race blaming me for ruining his race by saying "thanks for ruining my race" I have screenshot and footage of the incident in question, I hit martin at the initial part of the incident but the follow up spin was netcode, but reviewing his braking points and positioning for the rest of the race was inconsistent with his positioning with me at the point of contact.
stewards_decision: Abusive language or threat
stewards_comments:
his incident we will break into two parts. 

1) The contact between Berry and Hobson, with regards to the message above ‘his braking and positioning’ we feel the lap in question being lap 1 and as stated needs to be taken with extra care, expect the unexpected and as much as possible pre-empt the car/cars ahead decisions that may be different to a regular up to speed and temp laps. We also see netcode as stated above however the game is pre empting contact and even without the netcode contact was still being made and the outcome would have been very similar if not the same. (may we add please use the two fords ahead as a braking reference and Hobson brakes between both there braking points). 

2) The messaging between Hobson and Berry, we strongly advise against this and as well messaging via voice, we have a stewarding document in place for this reason and it should be used. If anyone is involved in an incident the best way to deal with it is by racing fair and square to a clean and respectful manner and beat that person FAIRLY on track.

driver_statement: Martin broke rules of messaging me mid race blaming me for ruining his race by saying "thanks for ruining my race" I have screenshot and footage of the incident in question, I hit martin at the initial part of the incident but the follow up spin was netcode, but reviewing his braking points and positioning for the rest of the race was inconsistent with his positioning with me at the point of contact.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments:
his incident we will break into two parts. 

1) The contact between Berry and Hobson, with regards to the message above ‘his braking and positioning’ we feel the lap in question being lap 1 and as stated needs to be taken with extra care, expect the unexpected and as much as possible pre-empt the car/cars ahead decisions that may be different to a regular up to speed and temp laps. We also see netcode as stated above however the game is pre empting contact and even without the netcode contact was still being made and the outcome would have been very similar if not the same. (may we add please use the two fords ahead as a braking reference and Hobson brakes between both there braking points). 

2) The messaging between Hobson and Berry, we strongly advise against this and as well messaging via voice, we have a stewarding document in place for this reason and it should be used. If anyone is involved in an incident the best way to deal with it is by racing fair and square to a clean and respectful manner and beat that person FAIRLY on track. §§

driver_statement: Morgan sends it up the inside of T3, I leave all the space and go all the way around the outside and I get hit and spun round, due to the contact, this causes me to lose the position
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Morgan takes the inside and would have had a call with car right throughout the corner. with the nature of the corner and acceleration Morgan’s car understeers into the side of Harry helping him execute the pass.

driver_statement: I overtook Wesley in the chase, he was behind at the brake zone, and failed to take the corner, spinning me out and causing damage.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: late move causing contact. Penalty for Wesley

driver_statement: Coming up to Murray's Corner Andy goes defensive by staying in the middle of the track, I see an opportunity and switch to the inside. Andy reacts to this by starting to squeeze while I stay straight (he started pointing his car to the apex at the 100m board invading my space and line) even tho I’m along side enough to claim the corner. Which ultimately results in the gap closing and running me off the track into the curb which then spins us both. Resulting in lots of places and time lost.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Adam was cleanly and fairly alongside, however in the braking zone there is left input on the wheel from Andy. Defensive driving is fine but must leave racing room when a car is fairly alongside. Penalty for Andy

driver_statement: Overtaken during 10 second countdown which race is neutralised and end of FCY overtaken before green announced.
stewards_decision: Failure to obey start procedure
stewards_comments:
- Overtaking cars under FCY cars 23 & 4 during 10 second countdown
- Speeding and overtaking car under FCY car # 79

driver_statement: Overtaken during 10 second countdown which race is neutralised and end of FCY overtaken before green announced.
stewards_decision: Failure to obey start procedure
stewards_comments:
- Overtaking cars under FCY cars 23 & 4 during 10 second countdown
- Speeding and overtaking car under FCY car # 79

driver_statement: Overtaken during 10 second countdown which race is neutralised and end of FCY overtaken before green announced.
stewards_decision: Failure to obey start procedure
stewards_comments:
- Overtaking cars under FCY cars 23 & 4 during 10 second countdown
- Speeding and overtaking car under FCY car # 79

driver_statement: Coming into braking zone Shaun was well over a car length behind, but decided to try and overtake anyway resulting in him T-boning me, which meant I had to tow because damage was so bad
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: late move with no lap causing major damage.

driver_statement: Dive bomb destroying my race, no apology, no attempt to redress positions.
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: late move with no lap causing major damage.

driver_statement: Driver Changed cars.
stewards_decision: Other - see comments
stewards_comments: Driver changed cars

stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: late move on lap 1 causing avoidable contact.

driver_statement: approaching the corner I'm a car length or 2 ahead, his line is incredibly compromised and it was always my corner but I knew he was there and i left him enough room but at the point of the initial apex he is understeering into me and car pointing straight ahead and not towards the corner. I also then held my brakes to avoid oncoming cars and traffic but he didn't
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: late move on lap 1 causing avoidable contact.

driver_statement: jochen goes to overtake someone but misses braking n hit me
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Failed to brake and caused avoidable contact

driver_statement: Dive bomb destroying my race, no apology, no attempt to redress positions.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Late move causing a collision

driver_statement: Car #096 tries to overtake car #05. Car #05 covers the inside of the corner, and car #096 just drives in to the rear of car #05 mid apex.
stewards_decision: NFA - No further Action
stewards_comments: Berry misses the cutback and causes front to rear contact resulting in damage.

driver_statement: Morgan attempts an overtake on me from quite far back. As I do not expect this, I don’t attempt to defend and Morgan finds the inside line. However, Morgan then understeers and collides my car which forces me off track (I was near enough as far to the left of the track as is possible without getting an off track at this point, so clearly ample racing room was given. Morgan is also still on throttle when he hits me despite being able to see me beside him from his onboard view). This resulted in me getting a slowdown and potentially affecting the rest of my race.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Does not allow fair racing room on corner exit gaining an advantage by pushing a car off track.

driver_statement: On the approach to Village Douglas dives for a gap in front of me but turns across my nose spinning himself and Murphy in the process, Raath is then collected Murphy’s car causing race ending damage.
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Wayne moves for a gap that is non existent and causes the front to rear contact between him and Shaun causing a collision,

driver_statement: Car #096 drives fully off track trying to overtake car #05, and hits car #05 causing contact and spinning both cars. Car #096 does try to address the situation but oddly makes the situation worse, the resultant contact damages car #05 to the point that car #05 has to pit for repairs.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Berry makes a late move when the gap was not really on, We see Berry attempt to try and redress the position which we appreciate, however we'd like to stress maybe do it after a corner/ at the safest opportunity.

driver_statement: Short sends a dive up the inside of Dorey into the loop, I’m already in the corner when Short drives into the back of me at the apex spinning me into the path of Dorey who has nowhere to go and makes contact with me.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Morgan goes for a late move and makes contact with Shaun causing a further unavoidable collision between Shaun and Jamie.

driver_statement: Side by side, leave the racing room and get driven through.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Jesse  makes initial contact which starts to turn Jamie , this is then collected however the next contact turns Jamie without chance of him to straighten up, this second contact is the one being penalised. Jamie leaves room for a car on the right at turn in and the same respect is not offered on exit by Jesse.

driver_statement: Davide was one or two laps down and was receiving blue flags. Going down the straight between turns 6-8 he wasn’t obliging to the blue. Going into turn 8 I go round the outside of him and he hits my rear pod and causes me to pit for damage
stewards_decision: Driving in a manner incompatible with general safety
stewards_comments: Penalty for Davide is 2 fold, the licence points for the ignoring of the blue flags, in addition stewards are disqualifying him from the results for the contact made with the lapping car.

driver_statement: Goes off at turn entry to turn 5a. Doesent attempt to brake and destroys my car. Do get an apology message, however i don't understand the no attempt to brake
stewards_decision: Causing a severe collision, resulting in race ending damage
stewards_comments: Jesse makes little to no attempt to brake and slow the car down after what appears initially to be a loss of traction over the ridge before the corner. If Jesse had made attempt to slow this would be a different consideration however he has done nothing to indicate that there was an issue or trying to remedy this. 15 championship points penalty

driver_statement: Upon the turn in point in turn 5b, driver Matthew Cheverton attempted to make a move up the inside well after I had committed to the apex. A collision was caused as contact was made on my right rear bumper, subsequently spinning me and Matthew gaining an advantage.
stewards_decision: Causing a collision or the appearance of a lack of control over the car.
stewards_comments: Matthew at fault, causes contact turning Jeffrey

driver_statement: Driver Changed cars.
stewards_decision: Other - see comments
stewards_comments: Driver changed cars
